General.Name: Fecon Foundation Engineering and Underground Construction JSC
General.Description: FECON Corporation provides foundation engineering and underground construction services in Vietnam and internationally. The company provides geotechnical consultancy, soil investigation and improvement, and foundation testing services; undertakes piling works; designs and manufactures PC/PHC pre-stressed concrete spun piles; and manufactures pre-fabricated vertical drains for soil improvement, as well as offers research and technological development services for foundation structure, underground construction, and infrastructure development. It also offers underground construction services, including foundation monitoring, TBM construction, and tunneling construction services; and undertakes infrastructure construction projects, such as civil work, road construction, port and waterway construction, and landslide prevention and slope stabilization projects. In addition, the company invests in various fields, such as transport infrastructure, energy infrastructure, and urban infrastructure and environment. Further, it engages in the mining and construction material supply, human resource supply, and construction machinery supply activities. The company was formerly known as FECON Foundation Engineering and Underground Construction Joint Stock Company and changed its name to FECON Corporation in May 2016. FECON Corporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.
